  day_of_week VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,

);

  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  reason TEXT
);

  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
